verses.verse: Judge <S%H8199><s%> me <S%H430><s%>, O God, and plead <S%H7378><s%> my cause <S%H7379><s%> against a ungodly <S%H3808><s%> nation <S%H1471><s%>: O deliver <S%H6403><s%> me from the deceitful <S%H4820><s%> and unjust <S%H5766><s%> man <S%H376><s%>.

For you are the God <S%H430><s%> of my strength <S%H4581><s%>: why do you cast me off <S%H2186><s%>? why go <S%H1980><s%> I mourning <S%H6937><s%> because of the oppression <S%H3906><s%> of the enemy <S%H341><s%>?

O send out <S%H7971><s%> your light <S%H216><s%> and your truth <S%H571><s%>: let them lead <S%H5148><s%> me <S%H935><s%>; let them bring me unto your holy <S%H6944><s%> hill <S%H2022><s%>, and to your tabernacles <S%H4908><s%>.

Then will I go <S%H935><s%> unto the altar <S%H4196><s%> of God <S%H430><s%>, unto God <S%H410><s%> my exceedingly <S%H8057><s%> joy <S%H1524><s%>: Yes <S%H3658><s%>, upon the harp will I praise <S%H3034><s%> you <S%H430><s%>, O God my God <S%H430><s%>.

Why are you cast down <S%H7817><s%>, O my soul <S%H5315><s%>? and why are you disquieted <S%H1993><s%> inside me <S%H3176><s%>? hope in God <S%H430><s%>: for I shall yet praise <S%H3034><s%> him <S%H3444><s%>, who is the health of my favor <S%H6440><s%>, and my God <S%H430><s%>.
